SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT `consumer_id` FROM `tb_points_record` WHERE `valid` = 1 AND `shop_id` = #{shopId} GROUP BY `consumer_id` ) r
WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM `tb_user_info` WHERE `user_id` = r.`consumer_id` AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%') )

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT `shop_id` FROM `tb_points_record` WHERE `valid` = 1 AND `consumer_id` = #{consumerId} GROUP BY `shop_id` ) r
WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM `tb_shop` WHERE `shop_id` = r.`shop_id` AND `shop_name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%') )

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT `record_id`, `product_id`, `points`, `oper_type`, `create_time` FROM `tb_points_record` WHERE `consumer_id` = #{consumerId} AND `shop_id` = #{shopId}
AND `create_time` >= STR_TO_DATE(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND `create_time` < DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY )
AND true = #{isPointsInShow} AND `oper_type` = 1 AND `consumer_visible` = 1 AND `valid` = 1) AS `points_in` LEFT JOIN `tb_product` AS `prod` ON `points_in`.`product_id` = `prod`.`product_id`
`prod`.`product_name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT `record_id`, `product_id`, `points`, `oper_type`, `create_time` FROM `tb_points_record` WHERE `consumer_id` = #{consumerId} AND `shop_id` = #{shopId}
AND `create_time` >= STR_TO_DATE(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND `create_time` < DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY )
AND true = #{isPointsOutShow} AND `oper_type` = - 1 AND `consumer_visible` = 1 AND `valid` = 1) AS `points_out` LEFT JOIN `tb_award` AS `award` ON `points_out`.`product_id` = `award`.`award_id`
`award`.`award_name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
) r
